mensagem-1: Here, we are committed to providing a powerful tool to assist legal professionals in calculating up-to-date case values based on Brazilian financial indicators. We know how crucial it is for lawyers to have accurate and up-to-date information to ensure their clients receive the fairness and due compensation they deserve.
mensagem-2: Our platform was developed with the aim of simplifying the financial calculation process, allowing you to quickly and easily access the most relevant information. With constant economic and legislative changes, keeping track of interest rates, inflation rates and other indicators has become a challenge, which is exactly why we're here to help.
mensagem-3: We understand the importance of accurate and transparent financial calculation, and our team of experts has worked diligently to gather the most up-to-date data available. Browse our website and explore the different functionalities we have designed to ensure an intuitive and efficient experience.
mensagem-4: Our commitment is to provide reliable and up-to-date information, allowing you to focus your energy on what you do best: defending your customers with excellence. In addition, we are always attentive to suggestions and feedback, constantly seeking to improve our platform to meet your needs.
mensagem-5: Join a community of lawyers committed to the fairness and accuracy of financial calculations. Use our tool and achieve even more consistent and reliable results in your causes.
mensagem-6: Welcome to the future of financial calculation for lawyers. Together, we will build a fairer and more transparent environment for the practice of law in Brazil. We look forward to helping you achieve the success and satisfaction of your customers.
licenca-1: This End User License Agreement (EULA) is a legal agreement between you (as an individual or on behalf of an entity) and Klav, Inc., regarding your use of Klav's applications and associated documentation (the 'Software'). IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO ALL OF THE TERMS OF THIS EULA, DO NOT INSTALL, USE OR COPY THE SOFTWARE.
licenca-2: You must agree to all of the terms of this EULA in order to use this Software.
licenca-3: If so, you may register, subscribe and use the Software for any purpose.
licenca-4: This Software automatically communicates with Klav servers for three reasons: (1) to receive and install updates; (2) submit error reports; and (3) submit anonymous usage information. You can view sample data to see what information is sent, and you can choose not to send anonymous usage data.
licenca-5: This Software is provided 'as is' without warranties, and you agree that Klav is not responsible for anything you do with it.
licenca-6: You really ought to just go ahead and read the whole EULA. It's not all that long. You should not only rely on this summary.
licenca-7: By downloading, installing, using, or copying the Software, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms of this EULA. If you do not agree to all of the terms of this EULA, you may not download, install, use or copy the Software.
licenca-8: This EULA gives you the right to install as many copies of the Software as you wish and to use the Software for any lawful purpose consistent with this EULA. Your license to use the Software is expressly conditioned upon your agreement to all of the terms of this EULA. This software is licensed, not sold. Klav reserves all other rights not granted by this EULA.
licenca-9: When using the Software you must use it in a manner that complies with the applicable laws in the jurisdiction(s) in which you use the Software.
licenca-10: You may not sell, resell, rent, lease or exchange the Software for anything of value.
licenca-11: You may not remove or alter any proprietary notices or marks on the Software.
licenca-12: The Software automatically communicates with Klav servers for three purposes: (1) to update the Software; (2) submitting error reports; and (3) sending anonymous usage data so that we can improve the Software. You may choose not to submit anonymous usage data, but if you do not want the Software to update automatically or submit error reports, please uninstall the Software.
licenca-13: Automatic software updates. The Software communicates with Klav to determine if there are any patches, bug fixes, updates, upgrades or other modifications to improve the Software. You agree that the Software may automatically install such improvements to the Software on your computer without providing any additional notice or receiving any additional consent. This feature cannot be disabled. If you do not wish to receive automatic updates, uninstall the Software.
licenca-14: Error reports. To help us improve the Software, when the Software encounters certain errors, it will automatically send some information to Klav about the error. This feature cannot be disabled. If you do not want to send error reports to Klav, uninstall the Software.
licenca-15: Anonymized usage data. Klav collects anonymous data about your use of the Software to help us make it more amazing. Approximately once a day, the Software sends this data to Klav's servers. If you do not want to send anonymous usage data to Klav, you can choose not to send it by changing your settings in Preferences.
licenca-16: Certain components of the Software may be subject to open source software licenses ('Open Source Components'), which means any software license approved as open source licenses by the Open Source Initiative or any substantially similar licenses, including, without limitation, any license that, as a condition of distribution of the software licensed under such license,  Require the distributor to make the software available in source code format. texto-o-inicio: At the end of July 2023, Valk Castellani, started the repository in Azure Repos with the aim of implementing this project with the aim of being a financial mathematical tool to adjust process values, in order to give important feedback to lawyers.
politica-1: Thank you for entrusting your personal information to Klav (or 'we'). This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your data, including any personal data we collect and process in connection with our website and any application, software, product and service provided by Klav, including any Beta preview (collectively, 'Service').
